description: This file defines a BookingProvider class that manages creating and listing user bookings, interacting with an API client and notifying listeners about state changes.

classes.name: BookingProvider
classes.description: A state management class extending ChangeNotifier to handle bookings related to the user.

methods.name: loadMyBookings
methods.description: Fetches and updates the current user's bookings from the API.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Creates a new booking via the API and updates the local bookings list.
